MetadataCommon.title: Oscar Carballido | UI Developer
MetadataCommon.keywords: UI developer, frontend developer, UI designer, frontend development, interface design, UI development, UI design, UX design, UI development, web design and development, design systems, Figma, React, Next.js, Tailwind, HTML, CSS, JavaScript
MetadataCommon.description: UI Developer specializing in interface design and frontend development. Creativity and logic combined to create functional, accessible, and visually coherent digital experiences.

About.title: Designer by training and Developer by choice.
About.subtitle: I'm a hybrid professional specializing in interface design and frontend development. I enjoy transforming visual ideas into real, functional, and accessible digital experiences. I combine aesthetic creativity with programming logic to approach each project holistically, from initial concept to code implementation.
About.description: Throughout my career, I've worked on branding projects, mobile, web, and desktop applications, always with a special focus on creating and maintaining design systems. I firmly believe in the importance of visual and technical consistency as the foundation for building robust, scalable, and intuitive digital products.

MyWork.title: How I work
MyWork.description: I design and build frontend interfaces based on design systems, creating reusable components and consistent, accessible, well-structured experiences.

MyValues.title: What you can expect from working with me
MyValues.description: A hybrid profile that bridges design and development, focused on visual consistency, interface quality, and clean, scalable frontend code.

MyFit.title: Where I fit best
MyFit.description: Digital products where design matters: web applications and SaaS products that require solid design systems and carefully implemented frontend interfaces.
